description: The daughter of TV hosts Richard Madeley and Judy Finnigan stepped out in skintight jeans on Thursday, one day before posting a series of racy photos that showed off her rock-hard abs.
title: Chloe Madeley covers up in skinny jeans for photoshoot
title_page: Chloe Madeley covers up in skinny jeans for photoshoot | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's developed a habit of posting selfies that depict her journey to peak physical fitness.
But on Thursday, TV presenter and model Chloe Madeley kept her rock hard abs totally covered as she headed to a photoshoot in North London.
She rocked a casual look that consisted of skintight, spray-on jeans, a black jacket and black sneakers from Chanel.
Scroll down for video
Casual chic: On Thursday Chloe Madeley - the daughter of chat show hosts Richard Madeley and Judy Finnigan - slipped into a pair of skintight, spray-on jeans ahead of a photo shoot in London
Aware that a team of professional make-up artists would soon add extra glow to her envious complexion, she kept her make-up to a minimum and let her natural beauty shine.
The 28-year-old - who is the daughter of chat show hosts Richard Madeley and Judy Finnigan - appeared to have plenty to talk about as she sauntered into the studio with her phone planted against her cheek.
Chloe has run the fitness and nutrition website FitnessFondue.com since 2013, offering readers tips on leading a healthier life and sharing stories of her personal struggles and successes.
She proved that she practices what she preaches, showing off her gym-honed pins and a decidedly peachy posterior.
Solid: Her jeans showed off her gym-honed calves and pert posterior
Accessorized: Chloe carried a black handbag with metallic embellishments
Chatty: The 28-year-old was seen chatting on her mobile phone as she walked in and out of the photo shoot
On Friday, following her photo shoot, Chloe was baring flesh once more, showing off her curves in a black sports bra and panties.
She sought to inspire her 65,000 Instagram followers and to attract some new ones.
'I talk about #cardio #carbs #weights #macros #calories #supplements and a hell of a lot more on my website,' she wrote under one sexy side-by-side montage.
In a second set she showed off her lean body from three different angles and wrote that she's had to work hard to get back in shape following the holidays.
Inspiration: On Friday Chloe posted these revealing Instagram photos along with the caption: 'I talk about #cardio #carbs #weights #macros #calories #supplements and a hell of a lot more on my website'
Work in progress: In another set of pictures, she wrote that she has spent January getting back in shape: 'This morning I woke up and scratched my belly and for the first time since mid December, I felt my #abs'
'This morning I woke up and scratched my belly and for the first time since mid December, I felt my #abs,' she said.
'I got back on the clean #diet and #training wagon 3 weeks ago and I can safely say I will have visually and noticeably changed my #body by week 4.'
The images come just one day after she posted a before-and-after set to Instagram, which showed her physical transformation through two bikini shots.
'If the girl who loves sleep and cake more than all her friends can do it, ANYONE can,' she wrote.
